summary: Refactored SocketQUICConnTable_retire_cid to use guard clauses, reducing nesting depth from 4 to 2 levels. Used continue statement for non-matching sequences and inverted last-element check. All QUIC tests pass with sanitizers. One pre-existing DNS test failure unrelated to changes.

test_results.note: Failed test is pre-existing memory leak in DNS module, not related to QUIC refactoring
